alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 1:37AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Franklin, south central Crawford, Sebastian, southeastern Sequoyah and Le Flore Counties through 215 AM CST... At 136 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles northwest of Pocola to 14 miles west of Octavia. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Poteau... Charleston... Greenwood... Barling... Pocola... Heavener... Lavaca... Spiro... Arkoma... Mansfield... Wister... Hackett... Howe... Hartford... Huntington... Bonanza... Midland... Cameron... This includes Interstate 540 between mile markers 6 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for northwestern and west central Arkansas...and southeastern and east central Oklahoma.
